snippet.title: Mechs & Mercs: Black Talons Gameplay video
snippet.description:
In Mechs & Mercs: Black Talons you take command of the Black Talons company, a fearless mercenary unit currently stationed in the Oberon system, torn apart by ruthless dictators and power-hungry warlords. 
The Black Talons provide everything from specialist squads and supplies, to entire armies, bases and powerful mechs of warfare to fight the warmongering Tzanar. 

This trailer features the Northstar Legion -  a conglomerate of pirates, cut-throats and mercenaries currently operating in Oberon. 
Their leader is Jason Zentar, a famous mercenary and ex-soldier who was able to unite all the gangs under his command. The Legion gained notoriety after it united under Zentar’s command, becoming one of the largest paramilitary forces in the system. 
Northstar members are mostly military veterans or deserters looking for greater profits.
